# Introduction

[Massa Station](https://github.com/massalabs/station) is a modular applications, it is easily extendable with plugins, or modules, allowing users to customize and enhance its functionality. For instance, one can use plugins to develop a [wallet](https://github.com/massalabs/station-massa-wallet) or a node manager that allows you to easily run a node.

As a developer, you can easily build your own module, and add it to the store to make it accessible to all Massa Station users. At its core, a plugin is a binary that adheres to specific [guidelines](./guidelines).
